Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: Inside the theatre, they were giving a performance of Bizet's Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 劇院裏他們正在演出比才的歌劇《卡門》。

sentences.english: Carmen, based on the Bizet opera.
sentences.chinese: 卡門的基礎上，比才的歌劇。

sentences.english: Bizet wrote operas, the most famous of which is Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 比才寫歌劇，其中最著名的是《卡門》。
